thread.title: Syrian forces reportedly seize rebel enclave

title: Syrian forces reportedly seize rebel enclave
text:
Syrian forces reportedly seize rebel enclave Thursday, April 12, 2018 - 01:23 
Syrian forces have taken the town of Douma, the last enclave near Damascus that remained in rebel hands, Russian media report. Douma was the site of an alleged gas attack on Sunday that has provoked the threat of U.S. military action.   
Syrian forces have taken the town of Douma, the last enclave near Damascus that remained in rebel hands, Russian media report. Douma was the site of an alleged gas attack on Sunday that has provoked the threat of U.S. military action.  //reut.rs/2Hvpfpm
